tool_description: Retrieve or update Twitch content via REST API. 50char
name: Twitch
title: Twitch

api_list.name: Get top games
api_list.description: Returns an array of top games on Twitch by current viewers.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of games to return, up to 100.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset to begin listing games, defaults to 0.
